description: This is a Java source file defining the JsonVariable class, which extends BaseVariable. It represents a JSON object variable used in code generation, with methods for encoding and decoding JSON data in native C and Java contexts. It references external classes like ICJsonVariable, ContextNative, TemplateMappings, and others related to code generation for JSON handling.

classes.name: JsonVariable
classes.description: A class representing a JSON object variable in code generation contexts, providing methods for encoding/decoding in C and Java, and maintaining internal state for native processing.

methods.name: resolveReferences
methods.description: Resolves references; currently a no-op for this class.

methods.name: isPtr
methods.description: Indicates that this variable type is a pointer.

methods.name: isString
methods.description: Indicates that this variable is not a string type.

methods.name: getCtype
methods.description: Returns the C type representation, which is 'cJSON'.

methods.name: getJavaType
methods.description: Returns the Java type, which is 'JSONObject'.

methods.name: getJsonKey
methods.description: Returns the JSON key identifier used in templates.

methods.name: setDoubleDeref
methods.description: Sets the internal doubleDref flag for native decoding.

methods.name: getNativeEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates code lines for native C JSON encoding.

methods.name: getNativeDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates code lines for native C JSON decoding.

methods.name: getJavaEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates code lines for Java JSON encoding.

methods.name: getJavaDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates code lines for Java JSON decoding.

methods.name: getJavaIpcObjectType
methods.description: Returns the IPC object type string 'JsonIPC'.
